Texts.Chs: 使用S.A.I.L到永夜林进行调查。
Texts.Eng: Follow the coordinates to the jungle via SAIL and investigate.

Texts.Chs: 在遥远的星球丛林中我找到了一个古代遗迹，这或许是个有趣的消遣。
Texts.Eng: I've discovered the location of ancient ruins deep in a far-off planet's jungle. This could make for interesting exploration.

Texts.Chs: 有些邪教徒在这里？他们到底在这里做什么？算了，他们的事我不想深入调查，我只对有价值的事物感兴趣。
Texts.Eng: What were cultists doing in here? They were up to something with the locals, but I don't know what. Well, it doesn't matter now. Their loot is mine!
